module.name: dimension_tolerance
module.keywords: module, dimension, tolerance, angular, location, linear, plus, minus, limit, fit
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of geometric dimensions of a shape and the direct application of tolerances to geometric dimensions.

inscope.li: specification of geometric dimensions of a feature of a shape;
dimensions that locate a feature relative to another feature;
specification of the value of a dimension;
dimensions that specify the size of a feature;The diameter of a hole is a dimension of size.The radius of a corner fillet is dimension of size.
specification of tolerances for geometric dimensions;
plus and minus tolerances applied to dimensions;

outscope.li: the presentation of dimensions and tolerances as annotations to the model or in a drawing.

alt_map.description: If there is no orientation and directed is 'false'.
If there is no orientation and directed is 'true'.
If there is orientation and directed is 'false'.
If there is orientation and directed is 'true'.
